review: already finished this 1 time on xbox gamepass and then got an eneba key for like 2 the bunker is a very good 35 hour contained horror experience great game design and use of the nemesis enemy type from the original re3 sound design graphics lighting etc its all top tier i still think soma is frictionals best achievement overall though for what this is a far shorter and tighterdesigned experience it works very well large amount of replayability too

all time horror game amazing atmosphere wonderful immersive sim qualities and very rewarding to the smart andor daring interesting to have a survival horror game thats also a playground of experiments to find the answer to your every problem while every playthrough is a little different

now this is some good horror design its not without its flaws but overall it is a creative and open ended design with high replayability  ive never been a fan of amnesia games because they have always been the run and hide in a closet simulator style horror but this entry gives you tools and options in how to confront the threat your wits are the real weapon i hope the series continues this design philosophy instead of returning to their old ways of hide in a closet sims
